exceptions.tactic: intros P x l H1 H2.
intros P' x l H1 H2.
intros P' x' l H1 H2.
intros P' x' l' H1 H2.

original: intros P x l H1 H2. induction H2; simpl. - apply Forall_cons; auto. - destruct (x <? x0) eqn: H3. + apply Forall_cons; auto. + destruct (x0 <? x) eqn: H4. * apply Forall_cons; apply Forall_cons_inv in IHForall; destruct IHForall as [IH1 IH2]; auto. * apply Forall_cons; apply Forall_cons_inv in IHForall; destruct IHForall as [IH1 IH2]; auto.
